title: Brigade Deployment Planning
description: A logistics planner must create a strategic deployment plan to move a brigade and its equipment from its home base to a theater of operations.

tasks.description: Catalog all personnel, vehicles, and equipment to be deployed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner generates a complete and accurate list of all assets for deployment.

tasks.description: Determine the optimal mix of transport assets (air, sea, land) to meet the deployment timeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner allocates the correct number and type of transport assets.

tasks.description: Generate a detailed time-phased force and deployment data (TPFDD) plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates a valid TPFDD that sequences the entire deployment.
